title: Perform a Root Cause Analysis (RCA) for a Breakdown
description: Following a major equipment failure, a reliability engineer needs to lead a formal Root Cause Analysis (RCA).

tasks.description: Create a new RCA record and link it to the corrective maintenance work order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the RCA and links it to the breakdown event.

tasks.description: Use a '5 Whys' or 'Fishbone Diagram' template to document the investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent populates the chosen RCA methodology template with findings from the team.

tasks.description: Identify the root cause (e.g., 'Incorrect lubricant used') and propose corrective actions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent documents the final root cause and recommends creating a new PM task to verify correct lubricant.
